entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0207.10723] The filer has reported a value for the concept InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue with a value of 2,682,000. This concept is used to report the fair value of investments for the cion:CollateralizedSecuritiesAndStructuredProductsEquityMember investment type. The filer has reported a value for the concept InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue with a value of 7,911,000 that includes the member cion:CollateralizedSecuritiesAndStructuredProductsEquityMember but also has additional members. This value is used to report the fair value of investments for the following dimensions dei:LegalEntityAxis=cion:CIONEagleTreeMember, us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=cion:CollateralizedSecuritiesAndStructuredProductsEquityMember. The value representing the fair value of investments in the cion:CollateralizedSecuritiesAndStructuredProductsEquityMember investment type is less than the value reported for the value 7,911,000 which is a subset of this investment type. The value reported for the investment type in aggregate should be more than or equal to the value reported for of 7,911,000. Please ensure that appropriate dimensions have been used to report these values.
Concept : us-gaap:InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue Value : 7,911,000 Period : 2024-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=cion:CollateralizedSecuritiesAndStructuredProductsEquityMember, dei:LegalEntityAxis=cion:CIONEagleTreeMember
Rule Element Id:10723 Rule version: 28.0.0RC1 - cion-20241231.htm 8
